description: Get artifact generated by an analysis result for a previously submitted analysis task.
name: get_result_artifact

raw.description: if True, return the raw JSON results of the API query

report_uuid.description: the unique report identifier returned as part of the dictionary returned by get_result()

score_only.description: if True, return even less data (only score and threat/threat-class classification).

uuid.description: the unique identifier of the submitted task, as returned in the task_uuid field of submit methods.
